summary: This is an O3DE Asset Gem package with character assets showcased in o3de-mutiplayersample game project. This includes a model and anims from Adobe Mixamo (https://www.mixamo.com) as well as additional o3de character content.
requirements: This Gem utilizes a character model and animations from Adobe Mixamo (https://www.mixamo.com), distributed under special provision by Adobe for o3de-multiplayersample. Original usage rights can be found here: https://helpx.adobe.com/creative-cloud/faq/mixamo-faq.html
